item.title: Zak add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Zak add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life is like arriving late for a movie, having to figure out what was going on without bothering everybody with a lot of questions, and then being unexpectedly called away before you find out how it ends." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Zak add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Zak add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Zak add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The big question is whether you are going to be able to say a hearty yes to your adventure " -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Zak add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Myth is what we call other people's religion." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Zak add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "When we quit thinking primarily about ourselves and our own self-preservation, we undergo a truly heroic transformation of consciousness." -- Joseph Campbell
